name: Basketball Finals
description: Championship match between top college teams with live commentary and audience engagement.

name: Literature Fest
description: Poetry slams, book discussions, and author sessions celebrating literature and creative writing.

name: Football
description: Inter-department football fixtures focused on teamwork, fitness, and competitive spirit.

name: Annual Debate
description: Formal debate event where student teams argue contemporary academic and social topics.

name: Gen AI Hackathon
description: Build-and-pitch hackathon focused on generative AI tools, responsible use, and real-world use cases.

name: Gaming Event
description: Casual and competitive gaming sessions including multiplayer tournaments and team challenges.

name: Research Poster Showcase
description: Academic exhibition where students present research posters, receive faculty feedback, and discuss ideas across departments.
